name: EOA-Migrator-API
description: A simple HTTP proxy API to fetch blockchain data

PROVIDER_NFT_MAINNET_API_KEY.description: The API key to read data from mainnet with the mainnet nft provider - by default, this is OpenSea

PROVIDER_TX_MAINNET_API_KEY.description: The API key to read data from mainnet with the mainnet transaction provider - by default, this is etherscan

PROVIDER_TX_POLYGON_API_KEY.description: The API key to read data from polygon with the polygon transaction provider - by default, this is polygonscan

PROVIDER_TX_BSC_API_KEY.description: The API key to read data from binancesmartchain with the binancesmartchain transaction provider - by default, this is bscscan

PROVIDER_TX_RINKEBY_API_KEY.description: The API key to read data from rinkeby with the rinkeby transaction provider - by default, this is api-rinkeby etherscan

PROVIDER_TX_KOVAN_API_KEY.description: The API key to read data from kovan with the kovan transaction provider - by default, this is api-kovan
